Testimonios.title: Stories that Inspire and Transform üå±‚ú®
intro: Each story proves that talent flourishes when combined with purpose, guidance and a growth mindset.
Discover how I've supported young professionals, leaders and tech teams to unlock their potential, strengthen their leadership and generate real impact in their projects and careers.

metrics.text: Experience valued for its closeness, clarity and real results. Each session leaves applicable learnings and visible change in how you think and act.
90% of those who have worked with me feel a tangible evolution in their mindset and professional performance.
Young tech professionals, career changers and team leaders who now work with more purpose, focus and confidence.

newsletter.title: Subscribe
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for tips, inspiration and more.

Pilares.title: The 6 pillars of the HugoTech experience

items.title: Explore your purpose and tech mindset
items.description: Discover your inner drive, redefine your beliefs and connect with the professional version you want to build. Change starts within: from personal clarity comes professional direction.

items.title: Design your growth roadmap
items.description: We co-create a realistic and ambitious roadmap: what to learn, how to apply it and how to measure your evolution without losing the balance between purpose and results.

items.title: Activate your agile and conscious leadership
items.description: Develop the skills to influence positively, communicate clearly and lead from trust. I integrate Management 3.0, agile facilitation and coaching practices to inspire without imposing.

items.title: Strengthen your personal and collaborative culture
items.description: Learn to build high-value relationships, where feedback, empathy and transparent communication are part of the DNA. Strong teams are born from emotionally and professionally mature people.

items.title: Build a data-driven culture
items.description: Incorporate evidence-based decision making and results. We analyze performance metrics, climate, technical quality and collaboration to drive continuous improvement.

items.title: Accelerate sustainable results and performance
items.description: Transform the way you and your team work: more effective deliveries, focused sprints, less technical debt and more innovation. When people grow, results multiply.

paragraphs.p1: I'm Hugo Casanova, from Peru and a systems engineer. For over 18+ years I have supported tech talents and teams across LATAM and the U.S. to grow with clarity, confidence and purpose.
paragraphs.p2: I discovered that what truly transforms isn't just code, but the people who create it. That's why I bring together mentoring, coaching and agility to turn human skills into real technical results.

items.title: Mentoring & Tech Coaching
items.description: I've guided 200+ talents (backend, frontend, fullstack, midstack, DB, QA, mobile, UX/UI, PO, SM, tech leaders) to strengthen their mindset, gain direction and show their value with confidence.

items.title: High-Performance Teams
items.description: I work with teams to build trust, communication and feedback; applying Management 3.0, Agile Team Facilitation, Scrum/Kanban, Lean and Agile HR so high performance is sustainable and human.

items.title: Agile Leadership that Transforms
items.description: I accompany leaders and organizations in digital and cultural transformation, combining strategic vision, data and culture to decide better and execute with focus.

paragraphs.p1: Don't worry, I'm here to guide you. This is your moment to pause, look at where you're heading and decide how you want to grow.
paragraphs.p2: In our session, I'll help you clarify your goals, understand your strengths and create your next step with purpose. Whether you're starting in tech or want to redesign your path, we'll co-create a clear and realistic plan.

PorQueGratuito.title: Why are 1:1 sessions free? üíö
PorQueGratuito.intro: Because I believe in giving back to the world what life gave me: knowledge, opportunities and faith.

mentoriaCard.title: Your 1:1 Tech Mentoring üíö
mentoriaCard.subtitle: Purpose coaching + Tech mentoring. Free.
mentoriaCard.p1: Feeling stuck in your first IT job? Don't know which path to take (DevOps, AI Engineer, Product Manager)? Imposter syndrome? You're not alone.
mentoriaCard.p2: Our 1:1 sessions (no cost) combine self-awareness coaching with tech mentoring. Before the 'what' comes the 'why'. Discover your values, define your purpose and overcome the mental barriers holding you back.
mentoriaCard.resultsTitle: What you'll achieve in your sessions:
resultsItems: Clarity about your professional purpose and next steps in tech.
Personalized roadmap based on your profile (backend, frontend, QA, PM, etc.)
Growth mindset and anti-burnout tools applicable to day-to-day.
mentoriaCard.note: 100% free. No fine print. Just honest conversation.

filosofiaCard.title: My Philosophy üå±
filosofiaCard.subtitle: Transform from being, build from purpose and lead with soul.
filosofiaCard.p1: Every conversation is an act of gratitude. It's not charity, it's responsibility. If today I can help someone find their way, it's because others did the same for me.
filosofiaCard.p2: HugoTech was born to be a space where talent meets purpose, without economic barriers, without cold transactions. Just honest conversations that transform.
resultsItems: First the being transforms, then the doing makes sense.
Having comes as a natural consequence.
filosofiaCard.note: B2B sessions for companies do have a cost, because they require structure, follow-up and measurable results. But the heart of HugoTech will always be free.

Inicio.title: Shape and boost your talent or your team's in the tech world

paragraphs.p1: I help you grow with purpose‚Äîwhether in personalized sessions for your professional development or in programs for companies that seek more connected, human and high-performing teams.
paragraphs.p2: At HugoTech, I integrate mentoring, coaching and agility so you develop human skills that empower your technical skills, strengthen your inner leadership and generate real impact from trust and purpose.

header.title: Ready to take the next step?

intro.p1: I help you grow with purpose‚Äîwhether you're a young talent seeking clarity in your tech path, or a company aiming to strengthen your team's mindset, communication and leadership.
intro.p2: Through <sb>mentoring, coaching and agility</sb>, I help transform your potential into action, your talent into confidence and your growth into real impact.

mentoriaCard.title: 1:1 Mentoring
mentoriaCard.subtitle: Boost your tech mindset and professional growth
mentoriaCard.p1: A space designed to help you develop clarity, direction and purpose in your technological journey.
mentoriaCard.p2: We combine professional coaching, mentoring and agility to align your technical skills with your human skills, so you can move forward with confidence and meaning.
resultsItems: Clarity about your purpose, strengths and next professional steps.
Growth mindset, self-leadership and continuous focus.
Personalized strategy according to your role (backend, frontend, QA, PO, SM, tech lead, etc.).
Individual feedback to improve communication, productivity and professional branding.
mentoriaCard.note: Growth is not just moving forward, it's doing it with purpose, focus and an expansive mindset.

empresasCard.title: Company Programs
empresasCard.subtitle: Strengthen your team's mindset, communication and leadership
empresasCard.p1: We design tailored programs for technology teams and companies seeking to align results with purpose.
empresasCard.p2: We integrate professional coaching, agility, effective communication and leadership to build more autonomous, connected and confident teams.
resultsItems: A culture of continuous learning and a growth mindset.
Human leadership with clarity, direction and purpose.
Teams aligned with strategic objectives and impact indicators.
empresasCard.ctaLabel: Schedule a call to learn about your needs
empresasCard.note: The best results are built when people have clarity, tools and a shared purpose.
empresasCard.imageAlt: Programs for companies: mindset, communication and leadership in tech teams

businessCard.title: Business Service
businessCard.subtitle: High-performance tech teams and a data-driven culture
businessCard.p1: Technical, cultural and strategic support for teams seeking to improve collaboration, deliver quality software and align with an agile, human and data-driven culture.
businessCard.p2: I integrate approaches from Management 3.0, Agile Team Facilitation, Lean, Professional Coaching and Data Thinking to develop autonomous, connected teams oriented toward real results.
businessCard.benefitsTitle: Real benefits for your company and team:
benefitsItems: Building high-performance teams with purpose and autonomy.
Reducing technical debt and improving the quality of deliverables.
Optimizing sprints and alignment between product, QA and leadership.
Data-driven culture: decisions based on metrics and continuous learning.
Workshops on culture, agility and conscious leadership.
Roadmap and dashboard for technical and human evolution.
businessCard.ctaLabel: Learn more about the Business Program
businessCard.note: Teams that trust, make decisions with data and deliver with purpose.

CCCausa.title: Growth with Purpose üåç‚ú®
CCCausa.subtitle: Your professional development also creates impact.

content.p1: At HugoTech, each individual session creates an impact that goes beyond you. As you strengthen your mindset, clarity and professional growth, you also help open doors for others.
content.pBold1: 100% of the income from 1:1 mentorships is dedicated to supporting initiatives that:
bullets: Promote tech education and the development of young talent across Latin America.
Encourage digital inclusion and equitable access to knowledge.
content.p2: We also promote responsible adoption and animal well-being‚Äîempathy transforms too.

invite.pBold: Do you know any NGO or tech project that's transforming lives?
invite.p: Share it here and let's add more causes to this movement.
